Basic functions

PageID

Signatures

PageID(id: String, name: (String) -> String, path: String = "$name/")

Parameters

  • id : An unique identifier of the page. For special pages, start with "_ ".
  • name : The name of the page for each language.
  • path : The path of the page. Defaults to the name of the page.

Creates a page ID.

builtin

Signatures

fun builtin(indexId: PageID, action: BuiltinTheme.() -> Unit)

Parameters

  • indexId : The PageID of the index.
  • action : The code of the generator.

Uses the builtin theme. Enables to use builtin stylesheet and templates.
